first-greeting.speaker: Anglerfish
first-greeting.text: Ah—!@ I-I didn't see you there...@ You shouldn't sneak up like that in the dark.

options.text: Sorry, I didn't mean to startle you.
You blend in so well… I almost missed you.
Relax, I'm not dangerous.

intro1.speaker: Anglerfish
intro1.text: O-oh… it's okay.@ I'm just not used to company down here.@ Most creatures avoid the deep.

options.text: I guess I'm not like most creatures.
It must get lonely down here.
Do you prefer it that way?

different.speaker: Anglerfish
different.text: I… I can tell.@ Most creatures swim away the moment they see my light.@ But you didn’t.@ You came closer.

options.text: It must get lonely down here.
Do you prefer it that way?

fluster1.speaker: Anglerfish
fluster1.text: Y-you noticed?@ I mean—of course you did, I have this light and everything...@ um...

options.text: It's a beautiful light.
It suits you. Gentle, but hard to ignore.

fluster2.speaker: Anglerfish
fluster2.text: B-beautiful?@ N-no one's ever called it that before.@ Most think it's...@ scary.

options.text: I think it's mesmerizing.
Maybe they just don't look closely enough.

soft1.speaker: Anglerfish
soft1.text: Sometimes it does get quiet... but the dark feels safe. It hides all the parts of me that might scare others.

options.text: You don't need to hide from me.
Maybe I like a little mystery.

neutral1.speaker: Anglerfish
neutral1.text: Maybe... it's easier that way. Fewer eyes staring, fewer words to trip over.

options.text: I don't mind the quiet.
I'll stay, even if you don't talk much.

bond1.speaker: Anglerfish
bond1.text: You really are strange... but maybe that's not a bad thing.

options.text: Strange is just another word for interesting.
Coming from you, I'll take that as a compliment.

bond2.speaker: Anglerfish
bond2.text: Heh... you make the dark feel a little less heavy. That's... new for me.

options.text: Then I'll stay a little longer.
Maybe light isn't so scary after all.

driftglass_hint.speaker: Anglerfish
driftglass_hint.text: Hehe...@ you know... its funny.@ The last time I felt like this was...

options.text: What? Do you like your ex more then me or something?
What is it?

driftglass_fail.speaker: Anglerfish
driftglass_fail.text: What!? No...@ you know what, never mind...

driftglass_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
driftglass_hint2.text: Oh its nothing,@ It's…@ just some pieces of glass.@ Old, broken things that drifted down from the surface.

driftglass_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
driftglass_hint2.text: I just…@ like how the current polishes them smooth again.@ Even sharp things can become gentle, given enough time.

driftglass_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
driftglass_hint2.text: I…@ keep them close. It makes the dark feel softer somehow.

driftglass_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
driftglass_hint2.text: If you ever find shards like this…@ um…@ maybe…@ bring it here?

moonjellycandy_hint.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint.text: Hehe...@ you know... its funny.@ The last time I saw a human when I got...@ well that doesn't matter.

options.text: Got what?

moonjellycandy_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint2.text: Oh its nothing, its just occasionally surface traders drop this sweet substance down occasionally.

moonjellycandy_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint2.text: I-I like how it glows a little…@ like it's alive...

moonjellycandy_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint2.text: And…@ it tastes nice.@ Soft.@ Sweet.

moonjellycandy_hint2.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint2.text: But don't tell anyone I said that.@ It's… embarrassing.

options.text: Why would that be embarrassing?

moonjellycandy_hint3.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint3.text: Because...@ creatures down here aren't supposed to like “cute” things.

moonjellycandy_hint3.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint3.text: They expect teeth and shadows, not sugar and light.

moonjellycandy_hint3.speaker: Anglerfish
moonjellycandy_hint3.text: If you ever find more of that candy…@ maybe…@ bring some by?

ending.speaker: Anglerfish
ending.text: If you ever get lost again... just follow the glow. I'll be waiting.
